Name: Scare Train VR
About the game: Scare Train VR is a Virtual Reality Ghost Train Ride. A Creepy journey through an abandoned mine, that is far from empty. Scare Train is not a Rollercoaster, it is a suspenseful ride that HATES motion sickness and LOVES to make you JUMP. Six minutes is a long time, in the dark, with Them... Do YOU have the Guts to Ride the Scare Train? If you are Faint-Hearted you should not ride... If you don't like Spiders you should not ride... If you like being SCARED then you should ride NOW... Although Scare Train VR does not feature nudity, blood or extreme content it is intense & frightening and is not recommended for children or anyone of a nervous disposition. ENTER AT YOUR OWN RISK!
